tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SBAR (IN If) (S (NP (NP (NN anyone)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN world)))) (VP (VBD texted) (S (NP (PRP me)) (ADJP (RB right)) (SBAR (RB now) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB lighten) (PRT (RP up)) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN mood)))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [texted/VBD mark>If/IN nsubj>[anyone/NN nmod:in>[world/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT]] xcomp>[lighten/VB nsubj>me/PRP dep>right/RB advmod>now/RB nsubj>it/PRP aux>would/MD compound:prt>up/RP dobj>[mood/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$]]]
